bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments--Security Services for Applications and Management Messages
Redline
IEEE Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments--Security Services for Applications and Management Messages - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 1609.2-2016 (Revision of IEEE Std 1609.2-2013) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard defines secure message formats and processing for use by Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) devices, including methods to secure WAVE management messages and methods to secure application messages. It also describes administrative functions necessary to support the core security functions.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
